CIT_rate.description: Top statutory corporate income tax rate
CIT_rate.title: Top statutory corporate income tax rate

PT_entity_tax_ind.description: Indicator variable indicating whether or not there is an entity-level tax on pass-through businesses. This tax is levied on entity-level profits.  Owners also pay individual income taxes on the distributions.
PT_entity_tax_ind.notes: Note that is this indicator is True, then the METR calculation for pass-through businesses will represent the effects of the entity-level tax and not the indvidiual-level tax.  This is becaue the METR represents the effective tax rate from the first layer of taxation.  The statutory rate on pass-through entities is set with the PT_entity_tax_rate parameter.
PT_entity_tax_ind.title: Non-corporate Entity Level Income Tax Indicator

PT_entity_tax_rate.description: Statutory income tax rate on pass-through business income levied at the entity level.
PT_entity_tax_rate.title: Statutory income tax rate on pass-through business income levied at the entity level.

ace_c.description: Allowance for corporate equity (fraction of equity deductible).
ace_c.notes: This parameter gives the allowance for corporate equity (ACE). Under an ACE system, companies can deduct a notional interest on their equity.  The default rate used in Cost-of-Capital-Calculator is the nominal interest rate on corporate debt.  Moving this parameter up from zero allows the corporate to have partial to full deductibility of the notional interest on equity.
ace_c.title: Allowance for corporate equity.

ace_nc.description: Allowance for non-corporate equity (fraction of equity deductible).
ace_nc.notes: This parameter gives the allowance for non-corporate equity (ACE). Only relevant if there is an entity-level tax on pass-through businesses (PT_entity_tax_ind=True).  Under an ACE system, companies can deduct a notional interest on their equity.  The default rate used in Cost-of-Capital-Calculator is the nominal interest rate on corporate debt.  Moving this parameter up from zero allows the corporate to have partial to full deductibility of the notional interest on equity.
ace_nc.title: Allowance for non-corporate equity.

ace_int_rate.description: Notional interest rate on the allowance for corporate equity.
ace_int_rate.notes: The default rate used in Cost-of-Capital-Calculator is the nominal interest rate on corporate debt.  Moving this parameter up from zero allows the corporate to have partial to full deductibility of the notional interest on equity.
ace_int_rate.title: Notional interest rate on the allowance for corporate equity.

interest_deduct_haircut_corp.description: Haircut on interest deductibility (fraction of interest not deductible) for C corporations.
interest_deduct_haircut_corp.notes: This parameter gives the fraction of interest payments that are not allowable as deductions against income for C corporations.
interest_deduct_haircut_corp.title: Haircut on interest deductibility for corporate entities.

interest_deduct_haircut_PT.description: Haircut on interest deductibility (fraction of interest not deductible) for pass-through entities.
interest_deduct_haircut_PT.notes: This parameter gives the fraction of interest payments that are not allowable as deductions against income for pass-through entities.
interest_deduct_haircut_PT.title: Haircut on interest deductibility for pass-through entities.

inv_tax_credit.notes: The investment tax credit rate gives the rate at which the cost of new investments are credited against the firm's tax liability.
inv_tax_credit.title: Investment tax credit.

phi.description: Fration of inventories that are accounted for using LIFO.
phi.notes: Fration of inventories that are accounted for using LIFO.
phi.title: Fration of inventories that are accounted for using LIFO.

inventory_expensing.description: Indicator for whether inventories are immediately expensed.
inventory_expensing.notes: Indicator for whether inventories are immediately expensed.
inventory_expensing.title: Indicator for whether inventories are immediately expensed.

tau_nc.description: Effective marginal tax rate on business income to pass-through business owners.
tau_nc.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on business income to pass-through business owners.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_nc.title: Effective marginal tax rate on business income to pass-through business owners.

tau_div.description: Effective marginal tax rate on dividends.
tau_div.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on dividends.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_div.title: Effective marginal tax rate on dividends.

tau_int.description: Effective marginal tax rate on interest income.
tau_int.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on interest income.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_int.title: Effective marginal tax rate on interet income.

tau_scg.description: Effective marginal tax rate on short-term capital gains.
tau_scg.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on short-term capital gains.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_scg.title: Effective marginal tax rate on short-term capital gains.

tau_lcg.description: Effective marginal tax rate on long-term capital gains.
tau_lcg.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on long-term capital gains.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_lcg.title: Effective marginal tax rate on long-term capital gains.

tau_xcg.description: Marginal tax rate on capital gains held until death.
tau_xcg.notes: Marginal tax rate on capital gains held until death.
tau_xcg.title: Marginal tax rate on capital gains held until death.

tau_td.description: Effective marginal tax rate on assets held in tax-deferred accounts.
tau_td.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on assets held in tax-deferred accounts.  Default value from CBO (2014)
tau_td.title: Effective marginal tax rate on assets held in tax-deferred accounts.

tau_h.description: Effective marginal tax rate on owner occupied housing deductions.
tau_h.notes: Effective marginal tax rate on owner occupied housing deductions.  Computed from Tax-Calculator vX.X.X using the 2009 PUF.
tau_h.title: Effective marginal tax rate on owner occupied housing deductions.

inflation_rate.notes: The default inflation rate is determined by the forecast of the Congressional Budget Office (CBO).
inflation_rate.title: Inflation rate.

nominal_interest_rate.description: Nominal interest rate paid on business debt.
nominal_interest_rate.notes: The default nominal interest rate is taken as the yeild on BBB corporate bonds.
nominal_interest_rate.title: Nominal interest rate paid on business debt.

E_c.description: Expected, after-tax return on corporate equity.
E_c.notes: Expected, after-tax return on corporate equity.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
E_c.title: Expected, after-tax return on corporate equity.

f_c.description: Fraction of corporate investment financed by debt.
f_c.notes: Fraction of corporate investment financed by debt.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
f_c.title: Fraction of corporate investment financed by debt.

f_nc.description: Fraction of non-corporate investment financed by debt.
f_nc.notes: Fraction of non-corporate investment financed by debt.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
f_nc.title: Fraction of non-corporate investment financed by debt.

omega_scg.description: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at short-term rate.
omega_scg.notes: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at short-term rate.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
omega_scg.title: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at short-term rate.

omega_lcg.description: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at long-term rate.
omega_lcg.notes: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at long-term rate.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
omega_lcg.title: Fraction of capital gains that are taxed at long-term rate.

omega_xcg.description: Fraction of capital gains that are untaxed.
omega_xcg.notes: Fraction of capital gains that are untaxed.  This could be because of a step-up in basis at death or that they are gains accruing to a non-taxable entity.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
omega_xcg.title: Fraction of capital gains that are untaxed.

Y_td.description: Number of years assets are held in tax-deferred accounts.
Y_td.notes: Number of years assets are held in tax-deferred accounts.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf

Y_v.title: Number of years inventories are held.

gamma.description: Fraction of debt owned through whole life-insurance policies.
gamma.notes: Fraction of debt owned through whole life-insurance policies.  Default value from CBO's Computing Effective Tax Rates on Capital Income (2007)
gamma.title: Fraction of debt owned through whole life-insurance policies.

m.notes: Dividend payout rate.  Default value taken from CBO (2014): https://www.cbo.gov/sites/default/files/113th-congress-2013-2014/reports/49817-taxingcapitalincome0.pdf
m.title: Dividend payout rate.

profit_rate.description: Profit rate used when computing EATR.
profit_rate.notes: Profit rate used when computing EATR.
profit_rate.title: Profit rate used when computing EATR.

new_view.description: Whether or not use the new view of dividend taxation.
new_view.notes: Under the new view of dividend taxation, dividend taxes do not influence investment decisions.  Under the old view, they do.
new_view.title: Use the new view of dividend taxation
